description: This file defines a singleton API client for making authenticated HTTP requests to a backend server in a Dart/Flutter project. It handles token management, generic request methods, and response parsing, supporting various API interactions such as user auth, profile, jobs, companies, applications, and messaging.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A singleton class managing network requests, authentication tokens, and request configurations.

classes.name: ApiResponse
classes.description: A class encapsulating the response from API requests, including success/error status, data, and error details.

methods.name: setToken
methods.description: Sets the authentication token used in request headers.

methods.name: token
methods.description: Getter for the current authentication token.

methods.name: request
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request with specified method, path, body, query parameters, headers, and authentication requirement.

methods.name: fromResponse
methods.description: Creates an ApiResponse instance from an http.Response, parsing JSON and handling errors.
